attributes.action: Exit the EU with a no deal brexit.
attributes.additional_details: Any possible deal with the labour party to enable the govt's current deal through is not likeley to benefit the uk, and will not deliver the brexit that was voted for by the people of the UK.
attributes.background: The govt should now stop trying to get their bad deal through parliament and concede defeat, allow the UK to leave the EU with dignity, and with no deal and allow uk business and the british people to move forward and make our own way once again in the world.
